TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit EntitySqlException extends System.Data.EntityException

Docs.summary: Represents errors that occur when parsing Entity SQL command text. This exception is thrown when syntactic or semantic rules are violated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about how to handle code exceptions, see <xref:System.Exception>.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void GetObjectData (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void GetObjectData(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
Docs.summary: Sets the with information about the exception.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `GetObjectData` sets a `SerializationInfo` with the exception object data that is targeted for serialization. During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the `SerializationInfo` transmitted over the stream.
For more information about how to handle code exceptions, see <xref:System.Exception>.

Docs.exception: The parameter is a reference ( in Visual Basic).
